涉.definition: (literary) to wade across a body of water; (bound form) to experience; to undergo; to be involved; to concern

涉世.definition: to see the world; to go out into society; to gain experience

涉事.definition: to be involved in the matter (Example: 涉事三人[she4shi4 san1 ren2], the three people involved); (archaic) to recount the events

涉及.definition: to involve; to relate to; to concern; to touch upon

涉嫌.definition: to be a suspect (in a crime); to be suspected of

涉案.definition: (of a perpetrator, victim, weapon, sum of money etc) to be involved in the case

涉渡.definition: to ford (a stream); to wade across

涉獵.definition: to skim (through a book); to read cursorily; to dip into

涉筆.definition: to start writing or painting (lit. "wet the brush")

涉縣.definition: She county in Handan 邯鄲|邯郸[Han2 dan1], Hebei

涉覽.definition: to browse; to glance through; to read

涉訟.definition: to be involved in a lawsuit

涉詐.definition: to be linked to fraudulent activity

涉足.definition: to set foot in; to step into; to become involved for the first time

涉險.definition: to take risks; involved in adventure
